text: @kumailn I’m the son of a pneumonia survivor. I’ve seen my own father at the edge of death in an ICU, hooked up to a respirator as doctors and nurses worked endlessly to make sure he could live another day. Thankfully, he recovered, but the thing that put him there was swine flu.
